about.title: About Union Law Firm
about.subtitle: Your trusted legal partner in Lebanon

story.title: Our Story
story.content1: Founded in 2020, Union Law Firm has been dedicated to providing exceptional legal services to families across Lebanon. We specialize in family law matters, understanding the sensitive nature of these issues and providing compassionate, professional representation.
story.content2: Our team of experienced attorneys has been helping clients navigate complex legal challenges for over a decade. We pride ourselves on our deep understanding of Lebanese family law and our commitment to achieving the best possible outcomes for our clients.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.content: To provide compassionate, skilled legal representation to families in Lebanon, ensuring that every client receives personalized attention and the highest quality legal services in their time of need.

values.title: Our Values
values.integrity: • Integrity and transparency in all dealings
values.respect: • Respect for cultural and religious values

familyLaw.title: Family Law Specialists
familyLaw.content: With years of experience in Lebanese family law, we handle complex cases involving divorce, custody, and financial arrangements.

inheritance.title: Inheritance Law
inheritance.content: We provide expert guidance on inheritance matters, ensuring fair distribution of assets according to Lebanese law.

custody.title: Child Custody
custody.content: We prioritize the best interests of children while protecting your parental rights throughout custody proceedings.

mediation.title: Mediation Services
mediation.content: We offer mediation services to help families resolve disputes amicably without lengthy court proceedings.

cta.title: Ready to Get Started?
cta.subtitle: Contact us today for a consultation about your legal needs.

contact.subtitle: Get in touch with our legal team

collect.title: 1. Information We Collect
collect.intro: We collect information you provide directly to us, such as when you:
items: Create an account or submit a legal case
Contact us through our website or email
Subscribe to our newsletter or updates

use.title: 2. How We Use Your Information
items: Process your case submissions and appointments
Communicate with you about your legal matters
Improve our services and website functionality

sharing.title: 3. Information Sharing
sharing.intro: We do not sell, trade, or otherwise transfer your personal information to outside parties except as described in this policy. We may share information with:
items: Legal professionals working on your case
Court systems as required by law
Service providers who assist in our operations

security.title: 4. Data Security
security.content: We implement appropriate security measures to protect your personal information against unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction. However, no method of transmission over the internet is 100% secure.

rights.title: 5. Your Rights
items: Object to processing of your information

contact.title: 6. Contact Us
contact.intro: If you have questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us at:

acceptance.title: 1. Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.content: By accessing and using Union Law Firm's website and services, you accept and agree to be bound by these Terms of Service. If you do not agree to these terms, please do not use our services.

services.title: 2. Services Provided
services.intro: Union Law Firm provides legal services including but not limited to:

responsibilities.title: 3. Client Responsibilities
responsibilities.intro: As a client, you agree to:
items: Pay fees and costs as agreed

relationship.title: 4. Attorney-Client Relationship
relationship.content: An attorney-client relationship is established only when you have executed a written agreement with Union Law Firm. Visiting our website or submitting information does not create an attorney-client relationship.

fees.title: 5. Fees and Payment
fees.content: Legal fees and costs will be as agreed in your written agreement. Payment is due as specified in your agreement. We reserve the right to withdraw from representation if fees are not paid as agreed.

liability.title: 6. Limitation of Liability
liability.content: Union Law Firm's liability is limited to the amount of fees paid by the client. We are not liable for any consequential, indirect, or punitive damages.

law.title: 7. Governing Law
law.content: These terms are governed by the laws of Lebanon. Any disputes will be resolved in the courts of Lebanon.

contact.title: 8. Contact Information
contact.intro: For questions about these Terms of Service, contact us at:
